histogram.name: PaymentRequest.CheckoutFunnel
histogram.summary: Counts the number of Payment Requests (PR) that go through each checkout step. A single PR may be counted in multiple buckets depending on its final status. e.g. A completed PR will be counted in all of the following buckets 1- Initiated, 2- show() called 3- Payment request triggered 4- Payment handler invoked, 5- Completed.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.CheckoutFunnel.Aborted
histogram.summary: The reason that lead to an abort of the Payment Request.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.CheckoutFunnel.NoShow
histogram.summary: The reason that leads to the Payment Request not being shown to the user.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.Events
histogram.summary: A bitfield representing the different events that happened during the Payment Request.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.Events2
histogram.summary: The 2.0 version of Events. A bitfield representing the different events that happened during the Payment Request.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.JourneyLoggerHasRecorded
histogram.summary: Whether a journey logger has recorded an events bit field or not.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.JourneyLoggerHasRecordedMultipleTimes
histogram.summary: When a journey logger attempts to record multiple events bit fields.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.MissingContactFields
histogram.summary: A bitfield representing different missing fields of the contact section in payment sheet. This only gets recorded when no complete contact profile is available. In case of multiple partially complete profiles, this is only recorded for the most complete one which is also the first profile in the suggestion list.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.MissingPaymentFields
histogram.summary: A bitfield representing different missing fields of the payment info section in the payment sheet. This only gets recorded when no complete payment instrument is available (SW based instruments are always considered as complete). In case of multiple partially complete cards this is only recorded for the first card in the suggestion list.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.MissingShippingFields
histogram.summary: A bitfield representing different missing fields of the shipping section in the payment sheet. This only gets recorded when no complete shipping profile is available. In case of multiple partially complete profiles, this is only recorded for the most complete one which is also the first profile in the suggestion list.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.NumberOfSuggestionsShown
histogram.summary: The number of suggestions shown to the user during a payment request.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.PaymentHandlerInstallSuccess
histogram.summary: Whether an attempted just-in-time payment handler installation was successful. Recorded when the attempted installation is finished.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.RefetchIconForInstalledApp
histogram.summary: True when chrome crawls to refetch the missing icon of an already installed payment app.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.SecurePaymentConfirmation.Funnel.AuthenticationDialogResult
histogram.summary: Records the action performed by the user on the Secure Payment confirmation dialog. The result is Accepted if the affirmitive button is pressed, Canceled if the dialog is canceled, or Closed if it is otherwise closed. Logged when the user interacts with the dialog or the dialog is otherwise closed.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.SecurePaymentConfirmation.Funnel.EnrollDialogResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of the Secure Payment Confirmation enrollment dialog. The result is Accepted if the user has clicked to confirm the enrollment, such as via the "Use Touch ID" button, Canceled if the user has clicked the button to cancel the enrollment, or Closed if the user has closed the dialog in any way, such as by closing the tab. Logged when the enrollment dialog closes.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.SecurePaymentConfirmation.Funnel.EnrollDialogShown
histogram.summary: Records whether the website was able to display the Secure Payment Confirmation enrollment dialog. The result is Shown if the dialog was displayed to the user or CouldNotShow if the dialog could not be displayed, e.g., if another enrollment dialog was already displaying. Logged in the browser process when a website attempts to display the enrollment dialog.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.SecurePaymentConfirmation.Funnel.EnrollSystemPromptResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of the FIDO system prompt, which is shown after the Secure Payment Confirmation enrollment dialog is accepted. The result is Accepted if the prompt is successful, i.e., the user has approved the FIDO system prompt, or Canceled if the prompt is canceled or failed. Logged when the FIDO system prompt closes.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.SecurePaymentConfirmation.Funnel.SystemPromptResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of the FIDO system prompt, which is shown after the Secure Payment Confirmation dialog is accepted. The result is Accepted if the prompt is successful, or Canceled if the prompt is canceled. Logged when the FIDO system prompt closes.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.SecurePaymentConfirmationCredentialIdSizeInBytes
histogram.summary: Records the size of Credential ID for secure-payment-confirmation method in bytes.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.ServiceWorkerStatusCodeTimeout
histogram.summary: True when a service worker times out 5 mins after request.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.TimeToCheckout.Completed
histogram.summary: Records the time between a payment request .show() and its completion.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.TimeToCheckout.Completed.Shown
histogram.summary: Records the time between a payment request .show() and its completion when payment sheet is shown.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.TimeToCheckout.Completed.SkippedShow
histogram.summary: Records the time between a payment request .show() and its completion when payment sheet is skipped.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.TimeToCheckout.OtherAborted
histogram.summary: Records the time between a payment request .show() and its termination by any factors other than the user (e.g. merchant).

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.TimeToCheckout.UserAborted
histogram.summary: Records the time between a payment request .show() and its termination by user.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.TransactionAmount.Completed
histogram.summary: Records the transaction amounts completed using payment request API after converting to USD.

histogram.name: PaymentRequest.TransactionAmount.Triggered
histogram.summary: Records the transaction amounts triggered using payment request API after converting to USD.
